text: Manuel San Germán was a Spanish actor. He appeared in seventeen films during his career, including the 1926 silent film Malvaloca.Goble p.8 ==Selected filmography== * Malvaloca (1926) * Agustina of Aragon (1929) == References == == Bibliography == * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. title: Manuel San Germán
